answers.author: Pooja Varma
answers.text:
Hi Debra, 
I found a few examples of community surveys from Fire and Police departments that should be useful to you:

Plantation, Florida Fire Department customer satisfaction survey provides separate surveys for the Fire Prevention Divisions, Fire suppression Division and Rescue Division.  
http://www.psd.plantation.org/fire/fd_css.html 
A survey result from the Fire Department of Louisville, Colorado that is a good indication of the kind of questions or instruments that can be used. 
http://www.louisvillefire.com/pdf/Citzen%20Survery%20Results.pdf 
Grand Rapids, Michigan’s Fire Prevention Bureau Customer Satisfaction Survey 
http://www.grcity.us/index.pl?page_id=11896
Rio Vista, California Fire Department Customer Satisfaction survey http://bit.ly/pAjjzh 
Gainesville, Florida Police Department Survey 
http://www.gainesville.org/community-survey/ 
A community satisfaction survey from Hawaii Police that provides survey summaries, results and FAQs with the chief’s responses. 
http://www.hawaiipolice.com/topPages/survey2.html 

I hope this is helpful,
Pooja Varma
International City/County Management Association
Knowledge Network Intern
pvarma@icma.org
